Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>If you have time to laze about here, then
you have time to help!

We still don't have enough supplies for
our <clr:0000>bases in the Depths<clr:ffff>!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>If you have time to chat, then you have
time to help!

We still don't have enough supplies for
our <clr:0000>bases in the Depths<clr:ffff>!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>That Link jerk wreaked havoc at the
branches and interrupted our supply of
food and materials.
Meanwhile, the folks down in the Depths
are all running around trying to get things
back in order...
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Painful_00>Ugh, I'm supposed to be an agent of
combat and destruction, why am I stuck
doing this?!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>Some fools keep yammering on about how
"Master Kohga has fallen," but Master
Kohga is indestructible!
That's why I'm gonna do everything I can
to protect the Yiga Clan until he's back!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>If not for that Link jerk, we wouldn't be
stuck doing this work!

I swear, if I ever see the guy, I'm gonna
wring his neck!
